QuestData.Title: Give a Dam
QuestData.Description: These loggers are destroying the forest, and harming the wildlife!$b$bBeavers need this wood for their dams, but have had to resort to scrounging for scraps.$b$bIt's not safe for them anymore! Please, help me chase them back to the safety of the water.
QuestData.LogDescription: Shoo $1oa Woodchewing Beavers back to the water.
QuestData.CompletionText: Between the logging and the giant spiders, the beavers are in such danger!
QuestData.RewardText: Hooray! Now the beavers will be safe from the lumberjacks and the spiders!
